name: HouseElwynn2
_source: s;Elwynn;Aye, s'what I figured...{w} was worth a shot, I suppose.{w}{clear}Better get back to work.
#Elwynn moves to the edge of the screen, then stops
s;SElspeth;O-oh!{w} Elwynn, what a surprise!{w}{clear}Where have you been all these years?
s;SElwynn;Ah, you know me.|I wandered, I dabbled, I wandered again.{w}{clear}But I'm finally back!
s;SElspeth;Yes, yes, I can...{w} see that...|By the goddess, what is all this?
s;SElwynn;It's treasure, is what it is!{w} Riches!{w} Fortune!{w} Our fortune!
s;SElspeth;Th-that's...{w} pardon me, but where on earth did you find all this!?
s;SElwynn;What's it matter?{w} With this, we won't have to worry about gold ever again!{w}{clear}We could even get out of this place, live somewhere better, somewhere-!
s;SElspeth;Stop.{w} Are you drunk right now?
s;SElwynn;Drunk on life!|Drunk on the future!
s;SElspeth;Answer me, Elwynn.|Where did you find all of this?
s;SElwynn;You really wanna know?|Well, fine!{w} I took it!
s;SElspeth;Took it...{w} you mean stole it?
s;SElwynn;Offa some fat cat!{w}{clear}Idiot was travelling without bodyguards, and with a little bit of magic, he was, eh,|persuaded to part ways with his goods!
s;SElspeth;You-!?{w} Elwynn, by the goddess, is this what's become of you?{w}{clear}A common highwayman, robbing merchants for threat of death!?
s;SElwynn;Wh-what-!?{w} Don't you get it?{w} This much money could change our lives!|Could change everything!{w}{clear}I thought this was what you wanted!
s;SElspeth;You were wrong.{w}{clear}Elwynn, you must return this.{w}{clear}All of it.
s;SElwynn;I...{w} b-but I can't...{w} I can't!
s;SElspeth;Of course you can!{w}{clear}The first step to redemption is recompense.{w} To walk the path-
s;SElwynn;No, you don't get it, I...|I can't be redeemed!{w}{clear}There's nobody to return it to, Elspeth!{w}{clear}There's nobody!{w} Because I...{w} I...{w}{clear}I killed him!
s;SElwynn;I didn't want to do it!{w} But he...{w} he just kept fighting back, and I...{w} and he...
s;SElspeth;Oh, dear goddess, please...{w} spare some mercy for my brother...
s;SElwynn;I only wanted to help!{w}{clear}I know how hard it's been for you, and I just wanted to-
s;SElspeth;Elwynn...{w}{clear}A crime like this...|There is no recompense.
s;SElwynn;Then...{w} does that mean that I'm...?
s;SElspeth;...{w} Give me that tome.|This is what you used, isn't it?
s;SElspeth;Look at me.{w}{clear}You're going to come with me to the chapel.|And you are joining the clergy.

s;SElspeth;I can only offer a glimmer of the goddess's light.{w}{clear}To redeem yourself after something so...{w} so...!{w} Ahem.{w}{clear}It will require you to bask in her radiance, to live within it,|and for it, for the rest of your days.
s;SElwynn;Even after what I did...{w} you'd welcome me into the church?{w} You're not mad?
s;SElspeth;I am furious.{w}{clear}Furious, and disappointed, and...{w} a-and...{w} and very, very sad.{w}{clear}But my sorrow can wait.|Yours cannot.
s;SElspeth;You will have to throw everything you are away.{w}{clear}The violence, the thieving...{w} the drinking.{w} Are you ready to do that?
s;SElwynn;Honestly?{w} No.{w} But...{w} I think I have to try.{w}{clear}If you'd give me this chance, even after what I've done...|I won't waste it.
s;SElspeth;I hope you really mean that...

s;Elwynn;This...{w} is a thief's magic.|{c:expression;Elwynn;HalfCloseEyes}A killer's magic.|A sinner's magic.|I left all that behind...{w}{clear}{c:expression;Elwynn;CloseEyes}Most of it, at least...{w}{clear}{c:expression;Elwynn;HalfCloseEyes}{w}{clear}Fate's forcing my hand here, eh?|I can't go back to that life...{w}{clear}but I can't pretend it's not still a part of me.

s;Elwynn;I'm a monk now.{w} I gotta protect people.{w}{clear}The faithful, the faithless, doesn't matter.|And for the same reason...|doesn't matter how I do it.{w}{clear}I'm taking this tome with me...{w} for the last time.
update_achievement;6;Old Means, New Purpose;Viewed Elwynn and Elspeth's Flashback in Ch2.
